task_log: Test (2024-08-20 10:36:24.449389): They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?

Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:27.041245): That's interesting! What do you think makes Ethan love the pajamas? Is there something special about them?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:27.057933): (On TV) Hannah entered the garden.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:29.091990): Ooh, what do you think Hannah's doing in the garden? Is there any tension or excitement building up?

Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:34.724100): Interesting choice! What do you think about Jackson liking the boots? Is there a significance to them in the story?

Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:36.162447): The lime in the cupboard sounds intriguing! Do you think it has any importance to the plot? What might it symbolize?

Test (2024-08-20 10:36:37.503113): (On TV) Hannah exited the garden.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:39.227134): Now Hannah is out of the garden! What do you think she was up to? Is there any connection between her and Ethan's actions?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:39.243134): (On TV) Jackson moved the lime to the basket.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:40.664283): Jackson moving the lime to the basket is definitely a curious move! What do you think it means? Is he trying to hide something or maybe make a statement?
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:42.078963): Great wrap-up! Based on the context, I think Jackson believes Ethan searches for the lime in the "cupboard".
